Project

"The HQ Sessions"
Acoustic Recording Sessions

Real. Raw. Country Music.

Country Rebel’s “HQ Sessions” have been known to produce some of the absolute best acoustic country music content you can find on the internet today. From the silky smooth harmonies and pitch-perfect notes of Home Free to the rough and weathered sounds of Aaron Lewis’ iconic voice - these sessions have truly helped showcase an endless stream of talent.

Click Above For Full Session Playlist

What I Worked On

Responsible for directing, recording, editing, and color-correcting - I also worked diligently with talent management and their teams to ensure optimal release ROI. Along with that, my duties included mixing and mastering the acoustic music and setting a specific tone and feeling to each video we put out. These sessions were initially recorded with iPhones and handheld recorders - I came in to lead the team and built a custom setup that involved DSLRs and multi-channel preamplifiers. At the end of my tenure, I held the position of Creative Lead and worked closely with my hand-picked team of editors and remote designers.
